website_summaries.verdict: While you'll pay up a bit for this option, it is comfortable to wear and has space for 2 drones and accessories.
pros: Interior is customizable with padded adjustable dividers
Has a rigid, lightweight outer shell, as well as dual external expansion pockets
All-weather cover protects everything, including any strapped on quads
cons: The backpack's bottom offers little protection
it has no feet, and is not hardened
The interior could be a little roomier to more easily fit larger drones

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but needs more interior space for the drone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas as a gift to my husband. He has been very pleased with the quality of the material and they protection that his drone and the parts have. We love that it came with a weather bag to keep the bag dry if he was ever caught in a rain storm. There are a lot of places to store all the extra parts which is great. The only thing that my husband said is that fitting a 250 drone into the interior spot is a squeeze. He has opted to keep his on the exterior for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kali Emens

customer_reviews.title: Yes indeed, shes a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is pretty darn sweet. The only thing it really lacks is some kind of bottom protection. Feet, molded rubber base. Something would be nice. Well thought out, there's a stash spot for everything in here. A word of warning do not leave your quad copter strapped in here for days on end. That warped my frame over a few days. Nice unit overall. I would recommend this product, and would definately buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schultz

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Best value item I've purchased in this hobby in 4 years. They put a lot of thought into this product and it shows. They thought of everything. The amount of compartments, straps, and zippers is almost overwhelming but it still manages to look clean with it fully packed. Materials seem very high quality and almost no corners seem to be cut in manufacturing. An overall excellent product AND value.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Been solid so far
customer_reviews.text: Got this to haul around my DJI magic pro a while back, it carries all the stuff without much issue. Wish there was a little more customization inside that you could do but there is a lot of it as is. The pack weights a ton when loaded up with drone stuff, but I guess that is kind of too be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: It's such a great feeling to just grab this bag and go
customer_reviews.text: I used to lug around a big toolbox. This backpack has changed my FPV experience. It's such a great feeling to just grab this bag and go. The amount of customization on the inside is great. This bag was really created with the pilot in mind. I feel confident putting my radio in this bag and know it's going to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D.Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag for the FPV enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing backpack. Must have for the FPV enthusiast. I've got both the X1 and X2, they make life much easier. This X2 can fit an incredible amount of stuff securely and separately making it ideal for hobbyist items.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vanston

customer_reviews.title: super killer toy satchel
customer_reviews.text: If thy had 10 stars it would have been clicked it's awesome protects my drone! pack it with 40 props 20 lipos tools I even got my field charger in it love this quality backpack thank you lowepro for fixing my fumbling around in my old bag at the park not sure about the durability yet cuz it's a new purchase but right now it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: elmer mueller

customer_reviews.title: Organized!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack as a gift so I don't know anything other than the recipient commented on how much he liked it. He had been using a regular backpack before receiving this one and liked how everything had a place. Based on those comments I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.

customer_reviews.title: accessories all in this backpack customization inside with move-able velcro separators good quality material
customer_reviews.text: Finally can store all in one place i can fit a 4" quad inside and strap the 5" outside (the 5" will also fit inside, but very tight fit) I can store my EV800D box goggles, QX7, quad, batteries, extra props, accessories all in this backpack customization inside with move-able velcro separators good quality material, sturdy, even has a cover for rain (a plus) plenty of room inside and outside.
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Good storage and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this pack. Good storage and easy to carry. Some of the interior pockets/storage areas look a little weak, but they are holding up so far. Overall, thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sedlak

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has been a lifesaver. It’s made hiking and camping trips much more enjoyable. It handles all my gear and I know its properly stored and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Chad sholly

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It is so nice to have all my drone stuff well organized when I am travelling. Quality is really good. Everybody who knows Lowepro knows that they make awesome Backpack it doesnt matter if camera or droneguard backpacks
customer_reviews.author: Stephan H.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think much this backpack is amazing there’s a space for everything and if there isn’t strap the drone to the front
customer_reviews.author: Pixiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bag for the FPV/Racing Drone Enthusiast!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is the best accessory you can buy when first starting out in this sport! Its incredibly Durable and very easy to store and get to all my tools and parts! A Must have!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: Around the world with me!
customer_reviews.text: Best bag pack for drone FVP. Not too big, not too small.Everything that I needed was well organized in my bag! Good quality, this bag travel around the world with me, and did lots of plane, hacking, motorcycle, boat, you name it. I recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Levalois

customer_reviews.title: No down side just up.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, helps keep my Rc safe and gives me loads of space for batterys. Its also extreemly comfortable. Its nice to have the ability to move any of the dividers. My goggles fit in nice and secured. Good spots for tools and extea props. U cant find a downside.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with ease
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the gear I need, safely and neatly stowed, plus my Mavic, plus two quadcopters on the outside. I use this backpack as my carryon when I fly and airport personnel have always been really nice. Took it on a cruise, too.
customer_reviews.author: Puddin

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for fpv in the field. Carries everything and more.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for fpv pilots. Holds everything I need in the field. 5 batteries, two quads, tools, spare props everything. Has a safe place for my transmitter, and waterproof cover. I won't use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Joe k

customer_reviews.title: Excelent backpack for mini quads
customer_reviews.text: I added some Iflight quad straps and I can carry 3-3" quads and 6- 5" quads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pack
customer_reviews.text: Fits all my gear and has straps for stuff that won't go inside!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M. Warren

customer_reviews.title: awesome drone backpack!
customer_reviews.text: i like this bag a lot. holds my qx7, dji goggles, bunch of batteries, mavic mini, and more!
customer_reviews.author: Chester

customer_reviews.title: Works great, feels like great quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great, feels like great quality, and a lot of room. It is worth every penny and one of the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The best Quad Backpack
customer_reviews.text: By far the best backpack out there for carrying quad racers and accessories. I keep 1 240 inside with RC and a 210 strapped to the outside. There is more storage than I have accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Viscomi

customer_reviews.title: Great Material
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best bags for drones in the world. I would really recommend it. lots of compartments, It can fit total of 4 drones, 3 external and 1 internal, along with the Remote Control and my Google and batteries.
customer_reviews.author: shummali

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag... definitely a head turner and holds everything I need for field repair, plenty of spare parts and Lipos..very comfortable and durable...yet light and not overbearing even on long walks to destination..but also set up well enough to drop in somewhere and get a few quick flying sessions on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag fits all my accessories n quad np ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag fits all my accessories n quad np n holds 2 more on the outside I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN M CARSON

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this backpack!! This holds all the gear I need when I go mini quad flying, and protects everything nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Usowski

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient: ) nicely made as well
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant with spending this much on a bag, but totally worth it. Everything has a place. All tools can come with me to the field. Super convenient:) nicely made as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: best back pack for all my quads and make it ...
customer_reviews.text: THE!!!!!, best back pack for all my quads and make it easy to organise every thing a lot better. I have my Fat shark dominate hd 2 goggles, qx7 transmitter, lots of props, 20 lipos, tools, spare parts, and a 250mm quad inside. followed by 2 other quads outside.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Exelent pack the the price
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. It holds everything that I needed to venture out into the field. Quality is great and the price can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jim E

customer_reviews.title: Its as awesome as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Has lots of spots for everything you will need in the field. Not too bulky. You can rearrange the linersci side to make dif size storage spots.
customer_reviews.author: Bea A.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great quality and feel very heavy duty. I love how modular it is. It's a definite game changer for the FPV hobby!
customer_reviews.author: Kayt

customer_reviews.title: Essential! Everything in one place!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is an essential item for your gear! Pockets for everything! I love having everything in one place!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack! Awesome craftsmanship, tons of storage and it's super stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good quality. Still need to figure out how to organize in a way to fit all my gear.
customer_reviews.author: SheepdogShaun

customer_reviews.title: High quality all the way around!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bag for my quads! I wish I could have gotten the next larger size, but this one is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Finley

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Fits multiple quads in it and holds more than enough of my other stuff so i always have spare parts.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy tavernier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Possible the best money I've spend in the hobby! Finally all my stuff in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Joel W Sarchet

customer_reviews.title: WOW  just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: If you FPV this is IT... I have nothing else to add.. Get it if you can find it!
customer_reviews.author: Manfred K. Dulle

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great, but it came without two of it's straps. Please send the two straps for an additional 2 stars in the review.
customer_reviews.author: Texy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected - great for toting around my two quads and lots of room for gear!
customer_reviews.author: LMatsumoto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best Quadcopter backpack I've ever had. Very easy to get organized with this.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Curole

customer_reviews.title: Mini quad backpack with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.text: Best quality backpack on the market. Plenty of room for all your FPV gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Hock

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a well thought out backpack with the superior quality Lowepro is known for. It offers convince and protection. I strongly recommend it for any mini-quad pilot.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the backpack . great quality. it just did not work for the parrot bebop 2
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Freakin awesome product. Don't know how I lived without it for so long!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen W.

customer_reviews.title: Why hadn't I bought this thing before now I'll never ...
customer_reviews.text: Why hadn't I bought this thing before now I'll never know. If you are looking for a backpack for your mini quad, you will not go wrong with this one. It holds every thing I need for on the go flying.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit...
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok. Little tight with antenna on quad. Have to bend it down to get it closed . Don't really care for that part but otherwise ok
customer_reviews.author: brian sharp
